name: mhub
description: Simple, flexible message hub using websockets

scripts.test: npm run -s build && npm run -s lint && npm run -s mocha
scripts.cover: npm run -s build && npm run -s lint && istanbul cover --report json _mocha -- -R spec dist/test/test-*.js dist/test/*/test-*.js && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -t html -o coverage/html-report
scripts.lint: tslint --format verbose -p src/ && tslint --format verbose -p test/
scripts.build: npm run -s build:src && npm run -s build:test
scripts.watch:start: mkdir -p dist/src/ && touch dist/src/mhub-server.js && nodemon ./bin/mhub-server --delay 1 --watch dist/
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run -s watch:src' 'npm run -s watch:test' 'npm run -s watch:start'

author: Martin Poelstra <martin@beryllium.net>
